metadata.dc:title: Occupational low back pain
metadata.dc:creator: Méndez Carrillo, FX
Gómez-Conesa, A
metadata.dc:description: In occupational low back pain they intervene psychological and physical variables of the own worker, as well as factors related to the work activity performed. In this article work activities associated with low back pain that have been object of different investigations, are revised, as well as the physical and psychosocial factors that contribute to the presence of low back pain syndrome in the labor environment (AU)
